entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:33 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
